body:
Hey, I'm new to this server. I've been playing Overcast Network for about a year and a half. I first joined this server 5 months ago but didnt play a mach. When someone on my OCN team recommended Avicus. I played a bit and I liked it but kind of didn't see the difference between Avic.us and OCN, could someone post why Avicus and OCN is different.

I cant guaranty that I will stay in this server but hopefully yeaf

Also, AMA ;)
body_tagged:

title: NeverKillMe/Exception_

replies.body:
Hello and welcome, the servers aren't that different because both are pvp servers but the community is different the maps obviously are differen so yeah and welcome again!


Edit: Do you like pie?
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body: Most people say Avicus is a copy of OCN, I feel the style of gameplay is a bit different 0-0

replies.body: Welcome to Avicus! I'd like to say the Avicus community is the closest and best minecraft community ever.
